articles.title: OnePlus 15 India Launch: When And Where To Watch Live; Check Expected Camera, Battery, Price, And Launch Offers
articles.author: Ankur Mishra
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 smartphone in India, which will be available for purchase starting November 13. The phone is expected to feature a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, a triple 50MP camera setup, and a 32MP front camera, and will run on Android 16-based OxygenOS 16. Launch offers, including trade-in benefits and a bundle deal with OnePlus Nord Buds, are expected to be available.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 India Launch: When And Where To Watch Live; Check Expected Camera, Battery, Price, And Launch Offers
articles.author: Zee News
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 smartphone in India, featuring a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, and a triple 50MP camera setup. The launch includes offers like trade-in benefits and a bundle deal with OnePlus Nord Buds. The smartphone will go on sale on November 13.

articles.title: Sources: Alibaba is renaming its AI app Tongyi to 'Qwen', aiming to make it more like ChatGPT, and adding agentic-AI shopping features for platforms like Taobao
articles.summary: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. is overhauling its AI app, renaming Tongyi to 'Qwen'. Alibaba is adding agentic-AI shopping features to Qwen for platforms such as Taobao.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Pat's Picks Movie Club and 9 more events
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network. According to Ookla Speedtest, T-Mobile is now recognized as America's best mobile network in the US.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Launch Tonight In India: How To Watch, Timings, Price, Specs, And More
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 flagship smartphone in India today at 7:00 PM IST. The OnePlus 15 features the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, a 6.78-inch LTPO AMOLED 165Hz display, a triple rear camera setup, and a 7,300mAh battery with 120W fast charging. The launch event will be streamed on OnePlus's official YouTube channel.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Launch Today: Specs, Features, Event Time & Livestream Details (13 November)
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 on November 13th, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip, a 7,300mAh battery, and three 50MP cameras. The phone boasts a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with a 165Hz refresh rate and includes new gaming tech for less heat and better speed, offering up to 165fps gameplay. It will be available for sale at 8 PM IST today.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 launches tonight in India: Confirmed features and expected price
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 in India tonight at 7 PM IST, featuring a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor. The OnePlus 15 will feature a 7,300 mAh battery with 120W wired and 50W wireless charging, a 165 Hz refresh rate display, and a triple 50 MP camera system. It will run on OxygenOS 16 based on Android 16 and is expected to be priced above 70K INR for the starting variant.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 India launch today: Date, timings, how to watch livestream
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching its new flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15, in India. The OnePlus 15 will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and features a 7,300mAh battery. The phone is expected to have a 50MP triple camera system and run on OxygenOS 16 based on Android 16.

articles.title: Best Chinese car yet? Why MG's ZS Pro left me stupidly impressed
articles.author: life
articles.summary: MG has introduced the ZS Pro.

articles.title: native AI propels the platform into a new age
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched .NET 10, the latest version of its software development platform. .NET 10 features improvements in performance, post-quantum cryptography for enhanced security, and native integration of Artificial Intelligence through the Agent Framework. The new release promises to be more productive, modern, secure, intelligent, and efficient compared to previous versions.

articles.title: Hyundai Home Shopping will launch a vehicle total comparative estimate service alone on TV Home Shop..
articles.author: Kim Hyejin
articles.summary: Hyundai Home Shopping is launching the 'Cabot Plus' service, a vehicle total comparative estimate, on TV home shopping through a partnership with Chabot Mobility. The service offers one-stop services like comparing new car prices, financial products, and construction for over 20 domestic and foreign vehicle models. Customers can receive benefits like cash prizes, gift certificates, and package construction services upon reservation or purchase.

articles.title: OpenAI drops GPT-5.1, says it is smarter and can be nerdy or cynical if you want
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5.1, an upgraded version of ChatGPT with improved intelligence and conversational abilities. The rollout includes two versions, GPT-5.1 Instant and GPT-5.1 Thinking, catering to different user needs, and introduces new conversation styles like Professional, Candid, and Quirky. The GPT-5.1 model is currently available to paid ChatGPT users and will be released to all users in 3 months.

articles.title: Top 10 wet and dry vacuums provide expert cleanup for any mess
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: Philips is offering a vacuum cleaner with PowerCyclone 7 technology and TriActive nozzle. BLACK+DECKER's vacuum has an 8L tank for multi-surface cleaning. INALSA provides vacuum cleaners WD10 and MasterVac 42 with varying suction power and tank capacities; MasterVac 42 with HEPA filtration.

articles.title: Gentle Cleansing Care for Dry and Sensitive Skin
articles.summary: Dr. Hauschka introduces a gentle face wash formulated for dry skin, designed with plant-based ingredients. This face wash aims to cleanse without stripping natural moisture, leaving skin softened, soothed, and refreshed. Regular use promises smoother, healthier, and naturally hydrated skin.

articles.title: WatchGuard Accelerates Platform Releases to Advance Four Innovation Spaces Critical for Modern Cybersecurity Success
articles.summary: WatchGuard Technologies has introduced multiple new products, integrations, and advancements to its Unified Security Platform. These innovations are designed to provide accessible, enterprise-grade security in response to the evolving threat landscape, focusing on practical, integrated protection that is easy to deploy and manage.

articles.title: WatchGuard Accelerates Platform Releases to Advance Four Innovation Spaces Critical for Modern ...
articles.author: Watch Guard Technologies
articles.summary: WatchGuard Technologies has announced a surge of innovation momentum across its Unified Security Platform, introducing new products and integrations. These advancements are designed to address the challenges of dissolving corporate networks and accelerating cyber threats through AI and automation.

articles.title: Tala Leka delivery service targets rural-urban drift
articles.summary: Unravel Viti, in partnership with NewWorld IGA, is launching a new grocery delivery service called Tala Leka to serve rural communities. The service allows rural residents to order groceries online from www.newworld.com.fj and have them delivered to their villages, reducing the need to travel to urban areas.

articles.title: Chick-fil-A is testing a new Chicken & Waffles Sandwich in San Antonio. But for how long?
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A is testing a new, limited-time Chicken & Waffles Sandwich in San Antonio. San Antonio is one of the two test markets selected by Chick-fil-A for this new product trial.

articles.title: My Honest Take on Breeze Vape: Is Breeze Prime Worth the Hype?
articles.author: surwillogregotp
articles.summary: The Breeze Prime, a disposable vape from Breeze Vape, offers improvements over previous models, including a rechargeable Type-C port, up to 6000 puffs, and adjustable airflow. It stands out due to its solid build, long puff life, consistent flavor, and smooth nicotine delivery, making it a practical and reliable choice for daily use.

articles.title: The Best Powerful Blenders That Aren't Vitamix
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: The article reviews and highlights several blenders from different companies like Ninja, Hamilton Beach, KitchenAid, Vitamix, Magic Bullet and Black and Decker that are available for purchase on Amazon. It describes the features and uses of each blender, including their capacity, blade design, ease of use, and price.

articles.title: OpenAI Unveils Smarter, More Conversational GPT-5.1: Learning from Past Mistakes, Delivering Fresh Upgrade
articles.summary: OpenAI has unveiled GPT-5.1 as an upgrade to GPT-5, incorporating lessons learned from previous iterations. The new model aims to address past criticisms and offers improvements in functionality.

articles.title: Meshy Hits $15M ARR with 30% Month-over-Month Growth, Unveils Meshy 6 Preview for Next-Gen 3D Creation
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Meshy launched Meshy 6 Preview in October, introducing advancements in mesh quality for its 3D generative AI tool. The new version includes richer surface details and more accurate geometric structures and has been praised by game developers and 3D printing enthusiasts, achieving high ratings on platforms like G2 and Trustpilot.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics to Launch Twice-folding Phone on Dec. 5
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is expected to launch its twice-folding smartphone, the 'Galaxy Z TriFold,' in South Korea and other major Asian markets on December 5th. The TriFold features a 10-inch display when fully unfolded and is priced between 3 million to 4 million won. Initial shipment volume is expected to be low, with the product viewed as showcasing Samsung's display technology.

articles.title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie trailer features new characters and Brie Larson
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Nintendo released the first trailer.

articles.title: Henkel's innovations showcased at CIIE
articles.author: 闫星周
articles.summary: Henkel Consumer Brands showcased new hair care products at the China International Import Expo, including Shiseido Professional's "Wonder Shield" hair spray, set to launch in Q1 2026, and Vidal Sassoon's hair oil, the first new product since Henkel's acquisition of the Vidal Sassoon business in China. The company's Taicang plant upgrade supports local production to meet Chinese market demands.

articles.title: 2026 GAC Emzoom: China's latest Hyundai Kona, MG ZS small SUV rival detailed
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: GAC is entering the Australian market with its Emzoom model, a Nissan Qashqai-sized car. The company has released full specifications for the Emzoom model to launch it in Australia.

articles.title: 25 Target Hair Items To Add To Your Routine
articles.author: Jamie Sanders
articles.summary: Kristin Ess introduced a texture spray, while Ouai launched a shampoo for thick hair. LolaVie released a glossing detangler, and Pura d'Or presented an apple cider vinegar shampoo. Other new hair products include a serum from Pattern, a dry shampoo from Living Proof, and a heat protectant spray from Drybar. Revlon launched a new hair dryer and hot air brush. Unbrush introduced a new hairbrush and Mielle Organics launched a hair oil infused with rosemary and mint. Camille Rose launched a moisture milk, and Tresemmé introduced a hairspray. Herbal Essences released a new conditioner, Color Wow launched an anti-frizz spray, Beachwaver launched a curling iron, and Being Frenshe launched a hair scrub. Briogeo and Amika released deep conditioning hair masks, Aussie launched a 3 Minute Miracle Moist product, SexyHair launched a leave-in conditioning spray, and John Frieda launched a hair serum. Kitsch and Goody introduced hair accessories, and The Ordinary launched a peptide-rich hair serum.

articles.title: These 23 Fall Products From Amazon's 'Most Wished For' Section Are Certified Bangers
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article showcases a curated list of 'Most Wished For' items on Amazon, featuring products like Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask in a new pumpkin pie scent, OPI RapiDry Quick Dry Nail Polish, Salt & Stone body wash in the cozy/woodsy scent Santal & Vetiver and Touchland's Power Mist hand sanitizer in the brand new scent "Confetti Cake". It also features Paris Hilton's heart-shaped Dutch oven.

articles.title: This $23 upgrade instantly made my home feel luxurious
articles.author: Jonathon Jachura
articles.summary: The SnapPower GuideLight is a replacement outlet cover with built-in LED lights designed to provide soft, automatic nighttime illumination. SnapPower also offers SwitchLights and USB outlets. These products aim to provide convenient and aesthetically pleasing lighting solutions for homes.

articles.title: How legacy brands can lead the next consumer revolution
articles.author: Ben Wintner
articles.summary: Michael Graves Design involved its community in selecting the finish for a new teakettle design, which influenced the product's launch. Pottery Barn launched a line of bathroom safety products created using value-sensitive design, focusing on aesthetics and functionality based on customer feedback. These examples highlight how incorporating consumer input shapes product development and launch strategies.

articles.title: Glovo Strengthens Customer Experience with LiveOps Hub
articles.author: Nigeria
articles.summary: Glovo has launched its LiveOps Hub in Abuja, Nigeria. The hub aims to enhance customer support, operational efficiency, and talent development by integrating AI with human intelligence. This launch represents Glovo's investment in innovation and service reliability in Nigeria's e-commerce ecosystem.

articles.title: 49 Items If Your Middle Name Could Be 'Impatient'

articles.summary: The article highlights new product launches, including a no-scrub weekly shower cleaner and a foot peeling spray for at-home pedicures. Oxo introduced a portable Cold Brew Rapid Brewer, while Lumify Eye Drops were presented as an improved solution for reducing eye redness. Additionally, Baby Brezza launched a Formula Pro Advanced for simplified baby formula preparation, showcasing innovations across diverse consumer needs.

articles.title: Introducing the TruTrade App: Revolutionizing Automated Trading on iOS & Android
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: TruTrade has launched the TruTrade Mobile Application, available on iOS and Android, empowering traders to manage automated trading systems from their mobile devices. The app, designed for users of TruTrade's automation software like "RipperONE AI," allows real-time monitoring, remote adjustments, and on-demand activation/deactivation of trading bots.

articles.title: Introducing the TruTrade App: Revolutionizing Automated Trading on iOS & Android
articles.author: Tru Trade
articles.summary: TruTrade launched the TruTrade Mobile Application, available on iOS and Android. The application allows traders to manage automated trading systems from their mobile devices.

articles.title: Sweet's Services Launches Advanced Drain Cleaning Solutions to Serve Shoshone and Surrounding Communities
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Sweet's Services, a plumbing and septic solutions provider, is expanding its drain cleaning services. The company is offering advanced solutions employing high-pressure hydro jetting and professional-grade drain cleaning tools to prevent clogs and improve water flow for both residential and commercial clients. Sweet's Services also provides 24/7 emergency support for these services.

articles.title: Sweet's Services Launches Advanced Drain Cleaning Solutions to Serve Shoshone and Surrounding Communities
articles.author: Ein News

The company employs high-pressure hydro jetting and professional-grade drain cleaning tools for efficient and thorough cleaning. Sweet's Services also provides 24/7 emergency support for urgent drain cleaning needs.

articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: NVIDIA's GeForce NOW is introducing 'Call of Duty: Black Ops 7' to its cloud gaming platform. The enhanced gameplay experiences will be powered by RTX 5080, expanding game availability across multiple devices.

articles.summary: DJI is globally launching its Neo 2 selfie drone, expanding availability beyond China to include countries like Japan, Canada, and the UK. The Neo 2 features obstacle avoidance with prop guards as a backup.
